short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store words and their definitions, and highlight them on websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This highly performant chrome extension allows you to keep track of a custom dictionary of words. Words will be highlighted on web pages, and their definitions will appear as tooltips when hovered over.
